CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of this aggregation control approach , high - performance PSCs based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM were fabricated affording a PCE of up to 10.8% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. PffBT4T-2OD: A specific type of polymer, Poly(9,9-dioctylfluorene-co-bithiophene) with a regioregular Tetradecylthiophene side chain and a regioirregular Decylthiophene side chain.
3. PC71BM: A specific type of material, [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are PSCs, PffBT4T-2OD, and PC71BM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:
1. PffBT4T-2OD
2. PC71BM

These are the specific materials mentioned in the paragraph that are relevant to the fabrication of high-performance polymer solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
